overview: These young JOCKS share living quarters, seeing their sexy "Roommates" every day in every way; with morning wood, when they bring guys home, when they return home from the work -- always getting turned on thinking "what if?" These amazing scenes unfold and unload when "Roommates" turn their housemate fantasies into reality. Brian Brody finds Donny Wright watching porn and joins in, Logan Stevens toys with Cameron Foster when a practical joke turns into a poke, Troy Collins offers himself up to Cole Streets for dinner, and Christian Wilde and Bryce Star take their friendship to the next level. These "Roommates" will have you wishing they had a vacancy in their apartment.
title: Roommates
